articles.title: City-size comet headed toward Earth 'grows horns' after massive volcanic eruption - Livescience.com
articles.description: The exploding comet, known as 12P/Pons–Brooks, is currently approaching its closest point to Earth during its 71-year orbit through the solar system.
articles.content: The comet 12P/Pons-Brook (12P) photographed on July 26, with the comet's "horns" clearly visible. The image was captured by the Las Cumbres Observatory as part of the Faulkes telescope Project. (Imag… [+4052 chars]

articles.description: Elon Musk's two-time ex-wife Talulah Riley and Thomas Brodie-Sangster have sparked speculation they are engaged.
articles.content:
She was married to the world's richest man not just once but twice.
Now, Talulah Riley is to wed again, this time to baby-faced actor Thomas Brodie-Sangster.
